markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Habu's Cudgel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1088)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 76

**Price** 415 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Long associated with a notorious crime boss in Nantambu, this stout _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [fearsome](/Equipment.aspx?ID=731) [club](/Weapons.aspx?ID=2)_ is studded with vicious-looking knobs of obsidian and wrapped in cloth for a better grip. It emits a ghastly groan when swung.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gesture at a square within 40 feet with _Habu's Cudgel_. The club causes a frightful wail to unleash from that square and casts [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110) (DC 24 Will save) targeting the creature in that square and all adjacent creatures.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Habu's Cudgel
primary_source: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 76

text: <title level="1" right="Item 8" pfs="Limited" > Habu's Cudgel May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands Source Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind pg. 76 Price 415 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk 1 Base Weapon Club --- Long associated with a notorious crime boss in Nantambu, this stout +1 striking fearsome club is studded with vicious-looking knobs of obsidian and wrapped in cloth for a better grip. It emits a ghastly groan when swung. Activate Two Actions Interact; Frequency once per day; Effect You gesture at a square within 40 feet with Habu's Cudgel . The club causes a frightful wail to unleash from that square and casts fear (DC 24 Will save) targeting the creature in that square and all adjacent creatures.
